headline: Heritage Global Partners to Conduct Court-Approved Auction of CaaStle, Inc.’s Clothing Inventory and Industrial Laundry Equipment
summary: SAN DIEGO, August 20, 2025--Heritage Global Partners ("HGP"), a subsidiary of Heritage Global Inc. (NASDAQ: HGBL) and a worldwide leader in asset advisory and auction services, has been appointed by the U.S. Bankruptcy Court for the District of Delaware, (Case #1:25-bk-11187), to conduct an online auction of assets formerly owned by CaaStle, Inc., a tech-enabled B2B clothing logistics company.
